data.lyric:
[ti:Run Rudolph Run (Single Version)]
[ar:Chuck Berry]
[al:Berry Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Run Rudolph Run (奔跑吧 鲁道夫) - Chuck Berry (查克·贝里)
[00:02.48]Written by：Marvin Brodie/Johnny Marks
[00:04.97]Producer：Leonard Chess/Phil Chess
[00:07.45]Out of all the reindeers
[00:09.07]You know you're the mastermind
[00:10.98]
[00:13.54]Run run Rudolph
[00:15.16]Randalph ain't too far behind
[00:17.14]
[00:19.94]Run run Rudolph
[00:21.37]Santa's got to make it to town
[00:23.36]
[00:25.99]Santa make him hurry tell him
[00:27.54]He can take the freeway down
[00:29.34]
[00:32.20]Run run Rudolph
[00:33.55]Cause I'm reeling like a merry-go-round
[00:35.73]
[00:38.32]Said Santa to a boy
[00:39.65]Child what have you been longing for
[00:42.09]
[00:44.87]All I want for Christmas
[00:46.26]Is a Rock and Roll electric guitar
[00:48.05]
[00:50.68]And then away went Rudolph
[00:52.59]Whizzing like a shooting star
[00:54.39]
[00:57.36]Run run Rudolph Santa has to make it to town
[01:00.85]
[01:03.78]Santa make him hurry tell him
[01:05.44]He can take the freeway down
[01:07.14]
[01:10.10]Run run Rudolph reeling like a merry-go-round
[01:13.57]
[01:35.31]Run run Rudolph Santa's got to make it to town
[01:38.66]
[01:41.66]Santa make him hurry tell him
[01:43.38]He can take the freeway down
[01:45.13]
[01:47.92]Run run Rudolph
[01:49.52]I'm reeling like a merry-go-round
[01:51.31]
[01:53.95]Said Santa to a girl
[01:55.51]Child what would please you most to get
[01:57.72]
[02:00.54]A little baby doll that can cry sleep drink and wet
[02:03.85]
[02:06.46]And then away went Rudolph whizzing like a Saber jet
[02:10.27]
[02:13.16]Run run Rudolph Santa's got to make it to town
[02:16.62]
[02:19.60]Santa make him hurry tell him
[02:21.33]He can take the freeway down
[02:22.99]
[02:25.84]Run run Rudolph
[02:27.44]I'm reeling like a merry-go-round
data.trans:
[ti:Run Rudolph Run (Single Version)]
[ar:Chuck Berry]
[al:Berry Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.48]//
[00:04.97]//
[00:07.45]你在驯鹿群里出类拔萃 
[00:09.07]你知道你就是首领
[00:10.98]
[00:13.54]快跑 快跑 鲁道夫
[00:15.16]兰道夫离你不远了
[00:17.14]
[00:19.94]快跑 快跑 鲁道夫
[00:21.37]圣诞老人得准时赶到城里
[00:23.36]
[00:25.99]圣诞老人让他加快速度 
[00:27.54]告诉他可以沿着高速路奔跑
[00:29.34]
[00:32.20]快跑 快跑 鲁道夫
[00:33.55]因为我像旋转木马一样摇摇晃晃
[00:35.73]
[00:38.32]圣诞老人对一个男孩说 
[00:39.65]孩子 你一直在期待什么
[00:42.09]
[00:44.87]我圣诞节想要的礼物
[00:46.26]就是一把摇滚电吉他
[00:48.05]
[00:50.68]然后鲁道夫像流星一样
[00:52.59]嗖嗖地消失不见
[00:54.39]
[00:57.36]快跑 快跑 鲁道夫 圣诞老人得准时赶到城里
[01:00.85]
[01:03.78]圣诞老人让他加快速度 
[01:05.44]告诉他可以沿着高速路奔跑
[01:07.14]
[01:10.10]快跑 快跑 鲁道夫 我像旋转木马一样摇摇晃晃
[01:13.57]
[01:35.31]快跑 快跑 鲁道夫 圣诞老人得准时赶到城里
[01:38.66]
[01:41.66]圣诞老人让他加快速度 
[01:43.38]告诉他可以沿着高速路奔跑
[01:45.13]
[01:47.92]快跑 快跑 鲁道夫
[01:49.52]我像旋转木马一样摇摇晃晃
[01:51.31]
[01:53.95]圣诞老人对一个女孩说 
[01:55.51]你最想要的礼物是什么
[01:57.72]
[02:00.54]一个可爱的洋娃娃 能哭会睡 像人一样栩栩如生
[02:03.85]
[02:06.46]鲁道夫转身离开 像喷气飞机一样掠过天际
[02:10.27]
[02:13.16]快跑 快跑 鲁道夫 圣诞老人得准时赶到城里
[02:16.62]
[02:19.60]圣诞老人让他加快速度 
[02:21.33]告诉他可以沿着高速路奔跑
[02:22.99]
[02:25.84]快跑 快跑 鲁道夫
[02:27.44]我像旋转木马一样摇摇晃晃
